abstract: Federal Election Commission records show Sen Bernie Sanders has benefited from super PACs supporting his campaign more than any other of Democratic nominees, even though he has made it point of his campaign to call for eradication of such groups; super PAC support for Sanders has come about through combination of conservative groups that hope to bloody Hillary Clinton's campaign and liberal groups that hope to see Sanders succeed.
lead_paragraph: So far, more super PAC money has been spent directly in support of Senator Sanders than for his Democratic Party rivals.

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Yamiche Alcindor and Sarah Cohen contributed reporting.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Tops His Rivals in Use of Outside Money
headline.print_headline: Sanders Tops His Rivals in Use of Outside Money

snippet: So far, more super PAC money has been spent directly in support of Senator Sanders than for his Democratic Party rivals....
